subject: Baseball
Drug Abuse and Traffic
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Baseball barred Mazzilli, the son of the former Met Lee Mazzilli, for 50 games without pay and said he tested positive for a second time for a “drug of abuse.”
snippet: Baseball barred Mazzilli, the son of the former Met Lee Mazzilli, for 50 games without pay and said he tested positive for a second time for a “drug of abuse.”
